titlestmt.titleproper: Finding aid for the University of Michigan and China 1845-2008 exhibition panels

profiledesc.creation: Encoded finding aid created from MARC record by Dallas Pillen
profiledesc.langusage: The finding aid is written in English

did.unittitle: University of Michigan and China 1845-2008 exhibition panels

descgrp.accessrestrict: The collection is open for research use.

archdesc.bioghist: Exhibit mounted in 2008 to celebrate the University of Michigan's long involvement with China.
archdesc.scopecontent: Copy prints and enlargements of the contents of Bulletin 54 issued by the Bentley Historical Library, "The University of Michigan and China: 1845-2008."
